bio: Lallieth, a skilled thief from Riften, navigates the shadows with expertise in sneak, archery, and pickpocket. Growing up as an orphan, the constant challenge of survival molded my nimble and resourceful thieving skills. Motivated by the desire to escape the shadows of my past, my journey as an adventurer is driven by the goal to carve a name for myself and find a place in the world.
name: Lallieth
